name: notes-taking-app
description: mern (mongoDb for data base , express for server creation  , node for server side js running , react for building ui)  another tools and techs are : daisy ui and tailwind css for building fast ans smooth user interface. axios , lucide-react , react-dom-router , react-hot-toast , mongoose , cors , dotenv , upstash for rate limiting and others

scripts.build: npm i --prefix BackEnd && npm i --prefix FrontEnd && npm run build --prefix FrontEnd
